text:
I can't reproduce the bug ...

BTW - when it occurs again, could you attach the first exception line ("Original
exception: ..." that says the line number in the flowscript (it's not visible on
the screenshot). Thanks!

creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text:
First error line is:

Original Exception: TypeError: Cannot convert null to an
object.(file:/home/roku/Work/aditus/aditus-site/cocoon-lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/content/admin/common/access-control.js;

I'm usng Linux+Firebird + Lenya from the day before yesterday...and Coocon-2.1.2

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The access controller resolver can't resolve the access controller ...

Rolf, could you please set the debug category "lenya" in logkit.xconf to "DEBUG"
and attach the lenya.log file? Thanks!

creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text: The error only occurs using jetty with lenya.sh. Using tomcat works fine.
Seems to work now. Thx to Andreas aka Nobby :)
creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
